description: To address the issue where starting VMs may fail after the installation of the October 2023 cumulative update, it is necessary to refer to the provided link that guides on the workaround. This knowledge-sharing post emphasizes the importance of following specific steps to mitigate the impact. Users should ensure they are checking compatibility and installation processes closely to avoid interruptions. By implementing the outlined procedures from the provided resource, system stability can be significantly improved. It is recommended to monitor updates from Microsoft regarding this specific installation issue for future guidance.
